name: wildcard
tagline: We build your business, not just your technology!
description:
At wildcard, we enjoy working with startups, and understand the difficulties of trying to build a business around a technology idea.
With more than 50 years of Information Technology and Business acumen between the two partners, we offer a full-cycle service for our clients from Business Strategy & Analysis; Marketing Roadmap; Product Roadmap; UX/UI; Branding; Mobile App & Website development; Maintenenca & Support.
Building an efficient team in the earlier stages of a startup is tough and your time and energy is better utilized elsewhere. That's why working with an experienced full-service shop makes more economical sense; both from time-to-market and financial perspectives. 
We build products with business objectives in mind. Our team has worked together for over 10 years – and we have all the necessary skill and experience to take a product from concept to launch and beyond. 
We also offer, complimentary consulting and interim CTO services with the production as the CEO of Wildcard is the resident CTO of one of the well respected accelerator programs in NYC
